DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim trial compare NNC0123-0000-0338 ( insulin-338 ) tablet formulation insulin glargine combination metformin without DPP-4 inhibitor subject type 2 diabetes currently treat oral antidiabetic therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Compare NNC0123-0000-0338 Tablet Formulation Insulin Glargine Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Currently Treated With Oral Antidiabetic Therapy
